programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The New Suspect
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new hunt for the mysterious Zodiac Killer gains unprecedented access to files, unearthing a complicated cypher that may contain the killer's name, and links between the Zodiac Killer and an unsolved case.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Military Connection
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The hunt uncovers clues that the Zodiac Killer may have served in the U.S. Armed Forces, as the team's supercomputer identifies strange symbols.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - A New Code Uncovered
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The hunt uncovers a mysterious new cipher related to the Zodiac Killer, while the team's supercomputer uncovers a strange lunar pattern linking the killings. A taunting riddle by the killer may lead to a body. A second prime suspect emerges.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Secret FBI Files
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The hunt goes into high-gear as the FBI releases secret files on the mysterious Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Code is Cracked
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Sal and Ken investigate San Francisco, the epicenter of the Zodiac Killer murders, as the Code Team announces extraordinary news.

programme.title: The First 48 - Taken
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 2 When a young man and his pregnant fiance are executed after a failed ransom attempt, Atlanta Homicide will stop at nothing to identify the elusive suspect.

programme.title: The First 48 - What About Me/Last Round (#437)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 36 In Tulsa, a mother of five is killed after a roadside argument spins out of control. In Mobile, a security guard tries to keep the peace and ends up brutally murdered.

programme.title: The First 48 - Death In The Family/Love Lost (#445)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 37 In Tulsa, a woman is found dumped in a hospital parking lot after someone she trusts crosses the line. Then, in Mobile, a jealous rage leaves a father of nine dead and threatens to tear his family apart.

programme.title: The First 48 - Easy Mark (#438)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 38 In Tulsa, when detectives investigate the murder of a man with a troubled past, they uncover a sinister plot.

programme.title: The First 48 - For Love and Honor/The Dark Side of Love (#441)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 39 In East Tulsa, a young man stands up for his girlfriend and pays the ultimate price. Then, a West-Tulsa man is gunned down in front of his girlfriend when someone from her past goes over the edge.

programme.title: The First 48 - Vengeance/Paid In Full (#442)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 41 In Tulsa, a quadruple shooting leaves two people dead as a vigilante seeks payback for his house being targeted in a drive-by shooting. In Mobile, a man is shot in front of his fiancée as a dispute over money takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: The First 48 - End Game (#444)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 45 In Mobile, a professor of economics is found shot dead outside his bedroom door when he doesn't show up for class.

programme.title: The First 48 - What About Me/Last Round (#437)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 36 In Tulsa, a mother of five is killed after a roadside argument spins out of control. In Mobile, a security guard tries to keep the peace and ends up brutally murdered.

programme.title: The First 48 - Death In The Family/Love Lost (#445)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 37 In Tulsa, a woman is found dumped in a hospital parking lot after someone she trusts crosses the line. Then, in Mobile, a jealous rage leaves a father of nine dead and threatens to tear his family apart.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Tantra Rapist
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 319 The Tantra Rapist follows the investigation to catch a serial rapist, his erratic and unpredictable lifestyle and how advanced DNA technology finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Forever Missing
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 In Canyon, TX, teenager Fred Moseley is left home alone over a long weekend – and abruptly disappears. His beloved new car is found abandoned on the outskirts of town... his shotgun missing. Chris Hansen investigates a mystery that lasted ten years.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - And Justice for All
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 In St. Augustine, FL, Jesse Whitley is a small-time scoundrel who drives off on a stormy night, never to return. His body is found floating in the St. John's river, and police have a list of suspects. It takes 17 years to bring his killer to justice.

programme.title: The First 48 - Murder on Maiden Lane
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 6 In Atlanta, a young father is gunned down by a brutal robbing crew and Detective Tracy Lewis discovers on her first case that she may be chasing the wrong suspect.

programme.title: The First 48 - Last Shift
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 7 In Tulsa, a vicious assault on a crowded barbershop leaves multiple people wounded and an innocent barber dead.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Last Call/Road Hazard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 A brutal shooting in Memphis leaves a single mom mourning her only son. The main suspect is a high-ranking gang member. Will his violent reputation keep witnesses from testifying?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Stolen Lives/Crimson Trail
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 In Miami, Florida, 25-year-old Pedro Roteta is stabbed in the middle of the street and left to die. Despite video of the murder and a confession the defense attempts to get immunity based on the controversial "Stand Your Ground" law.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Devil Inside / Flight Risk
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 After a woman's dismembered body is found beneath an overpass in Tucson, Arizona, the suspect reveals a disturbing dark side.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bad Attitude
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 After an unidentified man's stabbed body is found in a vacant Dallas, Texas apartment, two suspects both admit to setting up the man for robbery--and blame each other for the murder.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Acid Lady
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 A loving father vanishes without a trace in central California, setting off a feverish missing person’s investigation.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - If the Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The mysterious disappearance and presumed death of a surgeon’s wife sparks a feverish homicide investigation, which quickly goes cold.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Bonded in Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 A street preacher and his teenage protégé run an internet scam to rob unsuspecting men, steal their identities, then dump their dead bodies in the woods.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Killer Rabbi
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 When a rabbi’s wife is savagely murdered inside the family’s suburban New Jersey home, it looks like a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Murder Most Fowl
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 31 When an animal-loving loner fails to show up for Christmas dinner, detectives find the man dead in his trailer, alongside the feathery corpse of his lovebird and BFF.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Liars and Lustful
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 32 When the body of a soap opera star is found behind a dumpster in Los Angeles, detectives unravel a sordid plot.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Bad Fortune
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 A high-rolling, high-priced fortune-teller is slaughtered, and detectives must decipher a bizarre set of clues that weave superstition and brutality in equal measure.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Future Crime
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Can the sound of a suspect’s voice reveal his lie? Can the crucial moment of a crime be revealed? Can computers isolate a guilty face in a crowd? No longer science fiction, these are the high-tech tools of the forensics trade.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Vengeance Factor
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 157 The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Defector
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 158 When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of an impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Hunted
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 159 Investigating a planet applying for membership into the Federation, the crew of the Enterprise finds a group of inhabitants who used to be soldiers but now fight for their very existence.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The High Ground
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 160 While visiting a planet under civil war, Dr. Crusher is taken hostage by an opposing faction of the planet's ruling government.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Deja Q
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 161 Much to Picard's displeasure, Q reappears on the Enterprise, claiming to have been ejected from the Q Continuum, and therefore, lost his powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Matter of Perspective
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 162 The widow of respected scientist Dr. Nel Apgar accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband. Rather than turn Riker over for unfavorable trial, the Enterprise reconstructs the facts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Yesterday's Enterprise
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 163 The Enterprise C enters the Enterprise D's time and space continuum, where they find Picard and crew in a constant state of war with the Klingons, and only Guinan knows it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Offspring
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 164 After returning from a cybernetics conference to the Enterprise, Data creates his own "child," much to the chagrin of his captain, and without regards to the ramifications with Starfleet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 165 A Klingon commander boards the Enterprise in an officer exchange program initiated by Starfleet, much to the chagrin of the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 166 Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens and meanwhile replaced with a replica as impostor captain.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Captain's Holiday
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 167 After mediating a difficult peace agreement, Captain Picard is encouraged to take a much needed rest on a vacationing planet, where he's visited by a strange race from the future, in search of a dangerous weapon.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Tin Man
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 168 The Enterprise reaches out to an alien being while dancing around with the Romulans, who want to attack it in an act of vengeance.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hollow Pursuits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 169 A shy member of the "Enterprise" crew becomes addicted to the holodeck, where relationships are easier there than in real life, when his knowledge is needed in engineering.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Most Toys
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 170 When transporting a dangerous material to the Enterprise, Data is kidnapped and the crew is led to believe he is dead when the shuttlecraft he was piloting explodes enroute.

programme.title: Robocop - Robocop
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2 - Robocop 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3 - Robocop 3
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Robocop (2014) - Robocop (2014)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Earth vs. The Spider - Earth vs. The Spider
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Teenagers from a rural community and their high school science teacher join forces to battle a giant mutant spider.

programme.title: Blue World Order - Blue World Order
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After a nuclear war decimated the northern hemisphere, the surviving population was infected with a deadly bacterium. In an attempt to rebuild civilization, a self appointed government called 'The ORDER' distributed an immunization to the bacteria.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - The Samurai
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 Duncan must help the descendent of his old Japanese mentor, the man who gave him his katana.

programme.desc: Season 1, FailArmy celebrates the inner dancer in everyone with the ultimate dance fails compilation.

programme.desc: Season 1, Santa is flying in to host this holiday special; he's counting down some jolly videos and highlighting clips that have made it on his super nice list this year.

programme.title: AFV's 12 LOLs of Christmas - AFV's 12 LOLs of Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, This holiday season is full of laugh out loud goodness; counting down some of the best gift-giving, Christmas tree mishaps, and Santa blunders.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Future's End, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 The crew races against time to stop a 20th century computer industrialist from causing a 29th century disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Warlord
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 Kes's body is taken over by the mind of a ruthless political leader who's determined to regain control of his planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Q And The Grey
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Janeway is stunned when Q asks her to be the mother of his child.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Macrocosm
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Janeway, Neelix and the Doctor must retake Voyager from an infestation of microorganisms.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fair Trade
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Neelix's efforts to assist the crew wind up involving him in a deadly narcotics ring.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alter Ego
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A Holodeck character's obsession with Tuvok threatens to destroy Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Coda
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 Janeway finds herself trapped in a mysterious time loop, where a series of events repeatedly end in her death.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Blood Fever
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 A Vulcan mating ritual pits Torres against a fellow crewmember, while Chakotay makes a shocking discovery about invaders of a strange planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unity
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Chakotay finds a planet of unassimilated Borg drones from all over the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Darkling
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 After the Doctor adds a mix of new sub-routines to his program, his personality turns violent.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Rise!
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 19 The crew tries to help the inhabitants of a planet that's being bombarded by deadly asteroids.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Favorite Son
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 20 Kim becomes convinced he's a native of Taresia, a planet inhabited primarily by women.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Before And After
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 21 On her deathbed, Kes is bewildered when she begins reliving her life moving backwards in time.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Real Life
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 22 While Paris makes a daring flight into a subspace energy storm, the Doctor experiences the joys and sorrows of family life.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 20
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 20 This episode includes: Mystery Hum, UD: School Bus Family, Car Crash Thank You & UD, Dial's Escape & UD and Taking a Dive & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 This episode includes: World Leaders, Marie Hilley, Experts/Walker and Women in the Bay & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 This episode includes: Chameleon & UD, Lost For Life, Smitty & UD and Samuel's Ghost.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 8 This episode includes: Drug Family Fugitives & UD, Ghost Writer, Is Borton Back?, Pts. 1 & 2 and UD: Viet Pilot's Daughter.

programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 1 This episode includes: Brandon Lee, Missing Anchorwoman, First Love, Second Chance & UD, Killer Castro and Gulf P.O.W. Dream.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 19
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 This episode includes: Healing Touch, Not Suicidal, Shigemoto's Bodyguard & UD and Fatal Obsession & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 13 This episode includes: Newlywed Escape & UD, Gettysburg Ghosts, Trucker Disappearance & UD and Magic, the Gathering.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 3
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 3 This episode includes: Ground Zero, Arizona Souvenir Killer, Bowen Out & UD and Fallen Star.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 10
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 10 This episode includes: Ice Woman, Airline Employee Murder, Silicon Valley Hit, Florida Crime Spree & UD and Elvis, The Twinless Twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger - MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: King Dinosaur - King Dinosaur
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 In King Dinosaur, the crew pokes fun as scientists are terrorized by snakes, bugs, and dinosaurs on a newly discovered planet.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 11 A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.

programme.title: MST3K: The Giant Spider Invasion - MST3K: The Giant Spider Invasion
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the 'bots suffer through The Giant Spider Invasion (1975).

programme.title: Love at Sea - Love at Sea
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Olivia gets a great opportunity to organize an event on a luxury cruise.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker - Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father and is helped through this trying time by his friendship with a dog named Tucker.

programme.title: The Santa Suit - The Santa Suit
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Drake Hunter (Kevin Sorbo), the president of Hunter Marketing, has the perfect plan to boost sales for his father's toy company over the holiday season—hire department store Santas to promote his father's merchandise.

programme.title: A Nutcracker Christmas - A Nutcracker Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard - Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A 24-year-old first-time teacher overcomes her initial fears and prejudices to make a difference in the lives of the homeless children she teaches in a shelter's makeshift classroom. Stars Emily VanCamp.

programme.title: The Russell Girl - The Russell Girl
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl next door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

programme.title: Three Weeks, Three Kids - Three Weeks, Three Kids
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Jennifer's life is turned around when she must take care of her sister's kids.

programme.title: Front of the Class - Front of the Class
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on the true story of Brad Cohen, who, after being challenged by Tourette's syndrome from a very young age, defies all odds to become a gifted teacher.

programme.title: Stargate Origins: Catherine - Stargate Origins: Catherine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

programme.title: Stargate: The Ark of Truth - Stargate: The Ark of Truth
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate: Continuum - Stargate: Continuum
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

programme.title: Stargate Origins: Catherine - Stargate Origins: Catherine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Childhood's End
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Underground
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 The team visits the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however, when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Home
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Storm
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.
